sections.heading: Welcome
sections.content: We just want to say thank you for joining us in our second tanda. Betsy y I (Steve) are grateful for ya'll and for participating. Last year we started our first tanda and it was a big succeess. We had 10 people participating and this time we have 13. Continue reading and you will see the information on what to expect in this upcoming tanda.

items.item: 1. Tanda will start January 22,2023 and end January 14,2024.
2. The payments will be $100 each week. If you forgot to send money, don't worry I will send you a reminder through text.
3. All the money will be sent through Zelle. Here is my number so you can send me the money, 832-382-3729.
4. Since we are 13 people this time, the money will be given out every 4 weeks. The amount you should receive is $5,200 each participant.
5. Lastly, please give your host a tip if you feel like it.
